actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 relating to certain rules and regulations promulgated by the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act to prevent any rule or regulation concerning public lands and national forest lands including their management, rise, and protection, from taking effect until the expiration of 90 days after the issuance of such rule and then only if Congress has not adopted a concurrent resolution of disapproval.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 relating to certain rules and regulations promulgated by the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture.
